evidence.claim: Caregiver utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure, ensuring secure storage and processing of health data.
The platform supports FHIR and HL7 standards for interoperability with EHR systems.
Caregiver implements X12 transaction sets for insurance claims processing.
Integration with Azure enables Caregiver to utilize scalable cloud resources for application deployment.

icp.icp_reason: Caregiver utilizes X12 transactions and integrates with health tech systems, matching ICP criteria.
